elaborate and carefully worked 
out details, it will form a most 
valuable point of departure for those 
who may hereafter investigate 
the Nudibranchiata:
3rdly because it is not confined 
to mere details - the authors 
endeavouring to trace the general homology 
of some of the organs; and thus 
drawing attention to a very 
important though much neglected 
subject -
Thomas H. Huxley 
F.R.S.
The Committee of Papers
